page.title: 11THE DENTIST(CONT)
page.content: The surgery has to be very,clean. The uniform is optional,some dentists prefer to wear normal clothes,some people are afraid of the white uniform.Mr.Holdsworth feels that dentists are here to stay,{how will {bad teeth be pulled in the future?}He does see some changes{e.g.LASERS may {be used to help the dentists;}as well as some form of injection being developed to get around the problem of hard bone under the gum.{At the moment {there are some problems about how {dentists can be paid for their work in {the N.H.S.}Mr.Holdsworth does not always work at his own dental surgery.He visits certain hospitals which provide dental treatment.These are in Leeds.He goes to further his own experience. There are 2 other dentists in the practice,and 3 assistants.
